typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		product as (name as string, color as string),
		margin as [string,decimal(10,0)]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source2
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'delta',
	compressionType: 'snappy',
	compressionLevel: 'Fastest',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'DeltaDT') ~> Delta
source2 derive(calcMargin = round(margin['price']-margin['cost'],2)) ~> calcMargin
calcMargin select(mapColumn(
		Name,
		product,
		margin,
		calcMargin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
calcMargin aggregate(avgMargin = round(avg(calcMargin),2)) ~> Aggregate1
Select1 derive(calcMargin = toString(margin,'$#.##')) ~> formatCalc
Aggregate1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
formatCalc sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	compressionType: 'snappy',
	compressionLevel: 'Fastest',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'DeltaDT',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DeltaLake
